import { PieceColor } from '../../domain/piece' import { RemoteGame } from '../../state/reducers/root' import './GameInfo.css' export default function GameInfo( props: { game_over: boolean turn_username: string, winner_username: string | null winner_pieces: PieceColor | null opponent_username: string | null } ) { /* UPDATE THE SPECTATORS HERE */ return (
{ props.opponent_username == null ?
Waiting for an opponent
: null } { !props.game_over ?
Turn: {props.turn_username}
: null } { props.winner_username != null ? <>
Winner: {props.winner_username}

[{props.winner_pieces === 'w' ? 'WHITE PIECES' : 'BLACK PIECES'}]

: null }

0
) }
